0.1.4.name: connect20/chippinpayments
0.1.4.description: Chippin is a shared payment gateway that allows you, the merchant, the ability to offer group buying for a single order. This means that a customer can split the cost of a purchase with their friends/family.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
